about_the_game:
For hitting the target goal on social media, we're pleased to offer our fans this NASCAR Heat 3 "Test Scheme" pack, which includes schemes for 38 Monster Energy NASCAR Cup Series drivers! These unique schemes are used when Monster Energy NASCAR Cup Series drivers run test sessions at NASCAR tracks. They sport a sleek look, with very few sponsor logos.

The pack includes test schemes for:

Jamie McMurray
Brad Keselowski
Austin Dillon
Kevin Harvick

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: 64bit Versions of Windows 7, 8 and 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 530 or AMD FX 4100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 460 or AMD HD 5870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Soundcards
  • Additional Notes: Supported Graphics Cards: AMD HD5870 or better, HD6870 or better, HD7790 or better, R7 260 or better, R9 260 or better, Nvidia GTX460 or better, GTX560 or better, GTX650Ti or better, GTX750 or better, GTX950 or better
